name: eqvrelsym
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: mpd(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c0, c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c0, c1, c2)))

stmt.origin: mpbird(w0, wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, c1, c0))
-| wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c0, c1, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, c1, c0))
-| wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0)))

stmt.origin: 3syl(w0, wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0)), weqvrel(c1), wrel(c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0)))
-| wi(w0, weqvrel(c1))
-| wi(weqvrel(c1), wrel(c1))
-| wi(wrel(c1), wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c0, c1, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, c1, c0))
-| wi(w0, weqvrel(c1))
-| wi(weqvrel(c1), wrel(c1))
-| wi(wrel(c1), wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0)))

|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c0, c1, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, c1, c0))
-| wi(w0, weqvrel(c1))
-| wi(wrel(c1), wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0)))

body.origin: |- wi(wrel(c1), wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c0, c1, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, c1, c0))
-| wi(w0, weqvrel(c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c0, c1, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wss(ccnv(c1), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, c1, c0))
-| wi(w0, weqvrel(c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(ccnv(c1), c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(ccnv(c1), c1))
-| wi(w0, weqvrel(c1))
-| wi(weqvrel(c1), wsymrel(c1))
-| wi(wsymrel(c1), wss(ccnv(c1), c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → `' c1 ⊆ c1)
⊣ (w0 → EqvRel(c1))
⊣ (EqvRel(c1)→ SymRel(c1))
⊣ (SymRel(c1)→ `' c1 ⊆ c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, c1, c0))
-| wi(w0, weqvrel(c1))
-| wi(weqvrel(c1), wsymrel(c1))
-| wi(wsymrel(c1), wss(ccnv(c1), c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0[c1]c2)
⊣ (w0 → c2[c1]c0)
⊣ (w0 → EqvRel(c1))
⊣ (EqvRel(c1)→ SymRel(c1))
⊣ (SymRel(c1)→ `' c1 ⊆ c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, c1, c0))
-| wi(w0, weqvrel(c1))
-| wi(wsymrel(c1), wss(ccnv(c1), c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wsymrel(c1), wss(ccnv(c1), c1))
-| wb(wsymrel(c1), wa(wss(ccnv(c1), c1), wrel(c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, c1, c0))
-| wi(w0, weqvrel(c1))
-| wb(wsymrel(c1), wa(wss(ccnv(c1), c1), wrel(c1)))

|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, c1, c0))
-| wi(w0, weqvrel(c1))

comment: An equivalence relation is symmetric. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jun-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.) (Revised by Peter Mazsa, 2-Jun-2019.)
